alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 08 at 11:21AM CDT until April 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR BREEZY NORTHWEST WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND NORTHERN TEXAS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR BREEZY SOUTH WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND NORTHERN TEXAS... * TIMING...Afternoon through early evening today and Saturday. * WINDS...For today, northwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For Saturday, southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...For today, as low as 10 percent. For Saturday, as low as 8 percent. * TEMPERATURES...For today, middle to upper 60s today. For Saturday, middle to upper 80s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger
